eu.davidea.flexibleadapter.items

Interface IHeader<VH extends FlexibleViewHolder>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IFlexible<VH>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractExpandableHeaderItem, AbstractHeaderItem

    public interface IHeader<VH extends FlexibleViewHolder>
extends IFlexible<VH>
    Wrapper empty interface to identify if the current item is a header.
    Since:
    15/02/2016 Created
    18/06/2016 Changed signature with FlexibleViewHolder
    See Also:
    IFlexible, IExpandable, IFilterable, IHolder, ISectionable
